snippet: Thousands of Frank Lloyd Wright’s architectural drawings, models, photographs and documents are moving to New York, where the collection will reside at Columbia University and the Museum of Modern Art and become more accessible.
abstract: Thousands of Frank Lloyd Wright’s architectural drawings, models, photographs and documents are moving to New York, where the collection will reside at Columbia University and the Museum of Modern Art and become more accessible.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of Frank Lloyd Wright’s architectural drawings, models, photographs and documents are moving to New York, where the collection will reside at Columbia University and the Museum of Modern Art and become more accessible.

headline.seo: Frank Lloyd Wright Collection Moves to MoMA and Columbia
headline.main: A Vast Frank Lloyd Wright Archive Is Moving to New York
headline.print_headline: A Vast Frank Lloyd Wright Archive Is Moving to New York
